title: panic: reflect: call of reflect.Value.Field on int32 Value

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: needs-triage
labels.description: New issues needed to be validated

body:
### What happened?

Not exactly sure, but panic files started to appear.

### Syncthing version

v2.0.2

### Platform & operating system

FreeBSD amd64

### Browser version

Firefox 141

### Relevant log output

